data.title: Software Developer
content: Collaborated with the team to develop and maintain the Company website and Third Storage Localhost, an open-source, self-hostable storage and backend-as-a-service platform.
Built and optimized core client-side functionality using React.js & Next.js, applying advanced component lifecycle practices to reduce load times by 30%.
Integrated Redux for state management, reducing unnecessary re-renders by 25% and enhancing data flow consistency.
Applied TypeScript to enhance code quality and maintainability across the project, lowering runtime errors and improving developer collaboration.

data.title: Software Developer Intern
content: Designed and built 20+ reusable UI components using Tailwind CSS, improving design consistency and accelerating front-end development.
Wrote unit and integration tests with Jest, increasing test coverage by 40% and reducing production regression bugs by 20%.
Acquired hands-on experience with Web3 and blockchain architecture, applying distributed computing principles in real-world implementations.

data.title: Web Development Intern
content: Contributed to the development of the Smart India Hackathon 2022 platform, enabling secure idea submissions and evaluations for over 160,000+ students, significantly enhancing national-scale participation.
Developed a responsive, cross-device UI using JavaScript and Bootstrap, improving accessibility and reducing user drop-off by an estimated 25% during peak registration periods.
Implemented backend logic with Django and MySQL, including role-based authentication that streamlined access control for thousands of admin, evaluator, and participant accounts.
